#This file is autogenerated! Don't modify it directly!!!
spanish_greenland_area_scripted_country_name = { #Tierraverde
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:spanish_language
					culture.language = language:spanish_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:spanish_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:spanish_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:greenland_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
spanish_quebec_area_scripted_country_name = { #Quebeque

    	}
    }
spanish_new_jersey_area_scripted_country_name = { #Nueva Majorca, new <island>
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:spanish_language
					culture.language = language:spanish_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:spanish_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:spanish_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:new_jersey_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
spanish_pennsylvania_area_scripted_country_name = { #Quejana, after explorer Pedro de Quejo
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:spanish_language
					culture.language = language:spanish_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:spanish_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:spanish_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:pennsylvania_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }

    }
spanish_badlands_area_scripted_country_name = { #Malpaís
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:spanish_language
					culture.language = language:spanish_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:spanish_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:spanish_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:badlands_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }

    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:spanish_language
					culture.language = language:spanish_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:spanish_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:spanish_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:baja_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
spanish_tahejoc_area_scripted_country_name = { #Nueva Vizcaya
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {

					court_language = language:spanish_language
					culture.language = language:spanish_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:spanish_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:spanish_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:bahia_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
spanish_espirito_santo_area_scripted_country_name = { #Espíritu Santo
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:spanish_language
					culture.language = language:spanish_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:spanish_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:spanish_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:espirito_santo_area
    		}
    	}

    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }

    		}
    		OR = {

					culture.language = language:spanish_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:spanish_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:spanish_language
					}
    		}

spanish_northwest_coast_area_scripted_country_name = { #Nutca
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            NOT = {
    			any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:spanish_language
					culture.language = language:spanish_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:spanish_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:spanish_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:northwest_coast_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
